text.text: Go to the out-of-game room while nobody's watching.
Take ONE black essence, ONE red essence and THREE blue essence drugs, and no more than that.
You can use these essence drugs or sell them at the dark market.
You've perfected the creation of the magical essence.
Some use it for good and evil spells, some for rituals and some for recreational drug use.
Either way, you don't see the use of having all this essence for your own and you plan to sell it.
Earn at least 20 gold selling the magical essence.
